name: hormonal
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
medical
  specialized relating to hormones: a hormonal imbalance
informal feeling the effect of hormones, especially when this makes your emotions stronger or more likely to change than usual: I was pregnant and feeling a bit hormonal.
